Item_GoldenCarrot_Desc: Golden Carrot — Use to summon a horse.
Item_GoldenCarrot2_Desc: Golden Carrot — Use to summon a white horse.
Food_LifeFruit_Desc: A mysterious fruit brought from the world of Terraria. Due to the side effects of temporal displacement, it only grants temporary enhancement. Consuming it temporarily increases maximum health.
Item_ReturnOrb_Desc: A mysterious item brought from Monster Hunter. Use it to evacuate quickly and safely.
Item_MimicTearAshes_Desc: Legendary ashes brought from Elden Ring. Used to summon the Mimic Tear spirit, which takes the form of the summoner and fights alongside them.
Item_SnowPMCAshes_Desc: How could you be so cruel to the adorable Coal Ball?! Using it summons a cute Coal Ball spirit — though you still need to pay it in Bitcoin to hire it.
